abstract: Christina D Romer Economic View column observes former Federal Reserve chairman Paul Volcker in 1979 dramatically changed how monetary policy was conducted to tame high inflation; holds that today, Federal Reserve chairman Ben S Bernanke needs to set new policy framework to tackle unemployment, by targeting path of nominal gross domestic product.
snippet: Inflation was high in 1979 when Paul Volcker introduced a new policy framework. Today, Ben Bernanke needs to stage a quiet revolution of his own to tame unemployment.
lead_paragraph: Inflation was high in 1979 when Paul Volcker introduced a new policy framework. Today, Ben Bernanke needs to stage a quiet revolution of his own to tame unemployment.

headline.main: Dear Ben: It’s Time for Your Volcker Moment
headline.seo: Ben Bernanke Needs a Volcker Moment
headline.print_headline: Dear Ben: It’s Time For a Volcker Moment
